main.name: Nirupama Sharma
main.description: I'm working as a Software Engineer Intern at Intel Corporation, Oregon for Summer 2019. I'm an NLP and AI enthusiast. I work using Python, Java, MongoDB, Scikit-learn, RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL, React-Redux etc
main.bio: I am a Software Engineer with 5 years of work experience with companies like Intel Corporation, TIAA, New York Life Insurance etc. I am an NLP and AI enthusiast. I specialize in the development of scalable web and enterprise applications using Java, Python, Scikit-Learn, React-Redux, Vue.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, REST API etc. I am a Master of Science in Computer Science student at Northeastern University, Boston, currently working as Software Engineer Intern at Intel Corporation.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science with Concentration in Artificial Intelligence
